name: Roots of the Forest
description:
Explore the forest and fight your way in!

Small enemies are easy to avoid but some enemies are tough, you may use a Strong Attack to finish them off!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 - Roots

CONTROLSACTIONAD / Left-Right ArrowsMoveSpace Bar / ZJumpLeft Click / XAttackHold Left Click / XChargeRelease Left Click / X with ChargeStrong Attack
